text:
Didn’t expect Damian Lillard to be alright, he sounds pretty alright…

(all over my adidas insta feed lately) 
<https://soundcloud.com/damianlillard0/dame-dolla-x-raphael-saadiq-hero>

attachments.title: Dame D.O.L.L.A. x Raphael Saadiq - "Hero" by DamianLillard0
attachments.text:
Oakland natives, Dame D.O.L.L.A. and Raphael Saadiq, collaborate for the first time on “Hero” for #songsfromscratch, a series from Yours Truly & adidas originals.

Watch the Dame D.O.L.L.A. x Raphael Saadiq #SongsFromScratch documentary here:
attachments.fallback: SoundCloud Audio: Link: Dame D.O.L.L.A. x Raphael Saadiq - "Hero" by DamianLillard0
